product.title: Would You Rather Be A Bullfrog? | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Would You Rather Be a Bullfrog?
by Theo. LeSieg (Dr. Seuss)

This or that? Nonsensical twists on this classic question are asked by none other than Dr. Seuss (writing as Theo. LeSieg), and illustrated with the adorable cartoons of Roy McKie. Whether it’s better to be a minnow or a whale, or have a feathered or bushy tail, imagining the answers will get readers thinking—and giggling.

Tie-in Activity: This is a wonderful book to read aloud as a family. After asking a question, give everyone a chance to say what he or she would choose to be. You might engage your baby in the fun by encouraging her to point to a picture in the book.
